itemDescription: director general of MI5 from 1946 to 1953

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Percy Joseph Sillitoe KBE DL (22 May 1888 – 5 April 1962) was a Chief Constable of several police forces. He changed the role of radios, civilian staff, and women police officers within the police. He was later Director General of MI5, the United Kingdom's internal security service, from 1946 to 1953.
